text: See what Bravo ’ s Ariana Madix, Lala Kent and Scheana Shay had to say about the campaign Three stars of Vanderpump Rules are teaming up with PETA. Bravo ’ s Ariana Madix, Lala Kent and Scheana Shay are posing nude in body paint to raise awareness for orcas. “ Come together to free the orcas from SeaWorld, ” the ad reads, which shows the women transformed into orcas. “ Today we ’ re here with PETA shooting a campaign to release the orcas into seaside sanctuaries from SeaWorld, ” Ariana says in the campaign video.
